field_product_description: Drospirenone and Ethinyl Estradiol Tablets, USP, 3 mg/ 0.02mg
field_recall_reason_description: Due to out of specification (OOS) dissolution results at the 3-month stability time point
title: Jubilant Cadista Pharmaceuticals Inc. Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall of Drospirenone and Ethinyl Estradiol Tablets, USP, Due to Out-of-Specification Dissolution Test Results
description: Jubilant Cadista Pharmaceuticals Inc. is voluntarily recalling one lot of Drospirenone and Ethinyl Estradiol Tablets, USP, 3 mg/ 0.02mg, 28x3 Blister Pack/Carton to the consumer level. The affected product is being recalled due to out-of-specification (OOS) dissolution results at the 3-month stabili
